Name: Ozapell Mystery Text Adventure
About the game: Ozapell Mystery Text Adventure is a retro early 1980s text adventure experience involving a murder mystery that is generated differently each time the game is played. There are eight suspects. Search the house for clues. There are seven clues in every game but as many as three are false clues. Use deduction to determine who the murderer is. The gameplay consists of reading text and typing in commands using a keyboard just as the earliest computer games were played. Ozapell Mystery Text Adventure was developed entirely using Ozapell Basic (available exclusively on Steam): /
